trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control that can be used to host a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: A[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]可以使用控件的到主机[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]元素。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is automatically resized to display its entire contents.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否自动调整控件的大小以显示其完整内容。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control adjusts its size to closely fit its contents; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件调整其大小以完整显示内容;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hosted element has a transparent background.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示承载的元素是否具有透明背景。

trans-unit.source: The BackColorTransparent property enables bitmap copying, which enables hosted elements to use transparency over the host container.
trans-unit.target: BackColorTransparent 属性使复制位图，这使得承载的元素，若要通过主机容器使用透明度。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when the element is over an image or gradient background.
trans-unit.target: 为图像或渐变背景元素时，这非常有用。

trans-unit.source: For performance reasons, the BackColorTransparent property is turned off by default.
trans-unit.target: 出于性能原因，默认情况下 BackColorTransparent 属性已关闭。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the hosted element has a transparent background; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果承载的元素具有透明背景;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref>属性更改。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the BindingContextChanged event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContextChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关 BindingContextChanged 事件的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContextChanged?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContextChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode*> property can be set to an active value to enable IME support.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode*>属性可以设置为活动值的值，以启用 IME 支持。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Child*> element; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref>具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Child*>元素; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Child*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> hosted by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>由承载<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Only one element can be hosted, but Child can have any number of child elements.
trans-unit.target: 可以承载仅有一个元素，但子可以有任意数量的子元素。

trans-unit.source: The hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: 将托管[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]元素。

trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child*>属性设置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child*>

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor*>

trans-unit.target: 有关 CursorChanged 事件的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CursorChanged?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CursorChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件的默认大小。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the DefaultSize property, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关 DefaultSize 属性的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The default <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>的控件。

trans-unit.source: Immediately frees any system resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 立即释放使用的任何系统资源<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> references.
trans-unit.target: 当`disposing`参数是`true`，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>引用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用`Dispose`每个引用对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要释放托管和非托管资源;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>若要仅释放非托管的资源。

trans-unit.target: 双击控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: Enables a <xref href="System.Windows.Window"></xref> to receive keyboard messages correctly when it is opened modelessly from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 使<xref href="System.Windows.Window"></xref>从以无模式方式打开时正确接收键盘消息[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Call the EnableModelessKeyboardInterop method to forward all keyboard messages when a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] window is opened modelessly.
trans-unit.target: 调用 EnableModelessKeyboardInterop 方法，以转发所有键盘消息时[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]打开。

trans-unit.source: The EnableModelessKeyboardInterop method installs a message filter in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]-based application.
trans-unit.target: EnableModelessKeyboardInterop 方法安装中的消息筛选器[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]-基于应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The filter forwards all keyboard messages when the modeless window is active.
trans-unit.target: 无模式窗口处于活动状态时，此筛选器将转发所有键盘消息。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] window to be opened modelessly.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]以无模式方式打开的窗口。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is entered.
trans-unit.target: 进入控件时发生。

trans-unit.target: 有关 Enter 事件的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示控件是否具有输入焦点。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件有焦点，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base class implementation <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize*> to provide correct layout behavior for the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elements.
trans-unit.target: 重写基类实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize*>以提供正确的布局行为为承载[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]元素。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize*>

trans-unit.target: 自定义大小的区域[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]元素。

trans-unit.source: The computed by the control, given the constraints specified by proposedSize.
trans-unit.target: 由计算控件，通过指定约束 proposedSize 。

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: 在拖动操作期间发生。

trans-unit.target: 在控件接收焦点时发生。

trans-unit.target: 有关 GotFocus 事件的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent container of the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: 获取所承载的父容器[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]元素。

trans-unit.source: The host container is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, which is the parent container for the hosted element.
trans-unit.target: 宿主容器是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>，这是承载的元素的父容器。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: The host container is always at the root of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 宿主容器是始终根目录下的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]元素层次结构。

trans-unit.source: To access the parent of the hosted element, access HostContainer directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问承载的元素的父级，请直接访问 HostContainer。

trans-unit.source: The parent container.
trans-unit.target: 父容器中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the IME mode of a control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的 IME 模式。

trans-unit.source: The IME mode of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的 IME 模式。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control's display requires redrawing.
trans-unit.target: 控件的显示要求重新绘制时发生。

trans-unit.target: 有关 Invalidated 事件的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidated?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidated?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that all WM_CHAR key messages are forwarded to the hosted element.
trans-unit.target: 确保所有的 WM_CHAR 键消息都转发至承载的元素。

trans-unit.source: If the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element does not process `charCode`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> control processes it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果将托管[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]元素不会处理`charCode`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>控件处理其与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>

trans-unit.source: The character to forward.
trans-unit.target: 要转发的字符。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is pressed while the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 在控件有焦点并且按下某个键时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the KeyDown event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关 KeyDown 事件的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is pressed while the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 在控件有焦点并且按下某个键时发生。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.EnabledChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.EnabledChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnEnabledChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnEnabledChanged 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的数据。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.GotFocus"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.GotFocus"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the OnGotFocus method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnGotFocus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关 OnGotFocus 方法的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnGotFocus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnGotFocus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the OnHandleCreated method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关 OnHandleCreated 方法的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.target: 有关 OnLeave 方法的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> implementation of the OnPaint method forwards to the base class implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>OnPaint 方法实现将转发到基类实现。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Paints the background of the control.
trans-unit.target: 绘制控件的背景。

trans-unit.source: The OnPaintBackground method paints the parent control's background into an offscreen HBITMAP.
trans-unit.target: OnPaintBackground 方法绘制到屏幕外 HBITMAP 父控件的背景。

trans-unit.source: This bitmap is used as the background in the hosted element to support transparency.
trans-unit.target: 此位图中承载的元素的背景为用于支持透明度。

trans-unit.source: This method supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法支持[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]基础结构，不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the control to paint.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref> ，包含要绘制的控件有关的信息。

trans-unit.source: Renders the control using the provided <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 将使用提供的控件呈现<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PropertyMap*> that a property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 通知<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PropertyMap*>属性已更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PropertyMap*>

trans-unit.source: The name of the property that has changed and requires translation.
trans-unit.target: 已更改，且需要转换的属性名称。

trans-unit.source: The new value of the property.
trans-unit.target: 属性的新值。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.target: 有关 OnVisibleChanged 方法的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnVisibleChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnVisibleChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control's padding changes.
trans-unit.target: 在控件空白区更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the PaddingChanged event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PaddingChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关 PaddingChanged 事件的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PaddingChanged?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PaddingChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> control is redrawn.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref>重绘控件。

trans-unit.source: The implementation of this event adds event handlers to the base <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> event.
trans-unit.target: 此事件的实现将事件处理程序添加到基<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"></xref> event when a key is pressed while focus is on this control.
trans-unit.target: 之前发生<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"></xref>当焦点位于此控件上按下某个键时的事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the PreviewKeyDown event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关 PreviewKeyDown 事件的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key, ensuring that the hosted element has an opportunity to handle the command before normal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] processing.
trans-unit.target: 处理命令键，确保承载的元素有机会处理之前正常命令[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]处理。

trans-unit.source: If a key message is not handled by the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, it is forwarded up the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] class hierarchy for processing.
trans-unit.target: 如果不处理键消息所承载的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]元素，它转发向上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]类层次结构进行处理。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>，按引用传递，表示要处理的窗口消息。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values representing the key to process.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>表示要处理的键的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] shortcut key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果字符是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]快捷键; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character, ensuring that the hosted element has an opportunity to handle the mnemonic before normal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] processing.
trans-unit.target: 处理助记键字符，确保承载的元素有机会处理之前正常助记键[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]处理。

trans-unit.source: If a key message is not handled by the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, it is forwarded up the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] class hierarchy for processing.
trans-unit.target: 如果不处理键消息所承载的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]元素，它转发向上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]类层次结构进行处理。

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: 要处理的字符。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] shortcut key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果字符是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]快捷键; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the property map, which determines how setting properties on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> control affects the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: 获取属性的代码图，它确定如何设置属性<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref>控制会影响将托管[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]元素。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies have two similar but different property models.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]技术具有两个相似但不同属性模型。

trans-unit.source: *Property mapping* supports interoperation between the two architectures.
trans-unit.target: *属性映射*支持两种体系结构之间进行互操作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体和 WPF 属性映射](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap"></xref> that maps <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> to properties on the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap"> </xref>映射<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref>到上托管的属性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]元素。

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 拖放操作期间发生，并且允许拖动源确定是否应取消拖放操作。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the QueryContinueDrag event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关 QueryContinueDrag 事件的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 当调整控件时发生。

trans-unit.target: 有关大小调整事件的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft*>属性值更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft*>

trans-unit.target: 有关 RightToLeftChanged 事件的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Scales the parent container and the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: 缩放的父容器和托管[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]控件。

trans-unit.source: The scaling factor for the x-axis.
trans-unit.target: X 轴缩放因子。

trans-unit.source: The scaling factor for the y-axis.
trans-unit.target: Y 轴比例因子。

trans-unit.source: Activates the hosted element.
trans-unit.target: 激活所承载的元素。

trans-unit.source: The Select method activates the hosted element.
trans-unit.target: Select 方法激活所承载的元素。

trans-unit.source: If more than one hosted element exists, either the first or last element is activated, depending on the `directed` and `forward` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在多个承载的元素，激活的第一个或最后一个元素，具体取决于`directed`和`forward`参数。

trans-unit.source: Repeated calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Select%2A> method do not traverse the hosted elements.
trans-unit.target: 重复调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Select%2A>方法不会遍历承载的元素。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: To select subsequent elements, call the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.HostContainer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要选择后续元素，调用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.HostContainer%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.HostContainer%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus%2A>

trans-unit.source: This implementation forwards tab keys from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此实现的 tab 键转发[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify the direction of the control to select; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>指定要选择; 的控件的方向否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to move forward in the tab order; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to move backward in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要向前移动的 tab 键顺序;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>在 tab 键顺序中后移。
